Found this spot through friends and now it's our regular weekend hangout. The DJ knows exactly what to play, the bartenders remember your drink, and you can't beat their happy hour seafood specials. Truly authentic vibes. — Miguel Herrera.

La Malquerida has a solid atmosphere—good energy and familiar faces. I worked security for the owners and regulars and always appreciated the environment. — Jackson Gemmell.
